docs.text: Welcome to QRCode API A QRCode generating API to easily and quickly generate QR Codes. Overview a Basic Usage Generating the Codes /qrcode method post Body Parameters size - The qrcode's version size. Min: 3 Max: 45 Recommended: auto quality - Image quality Min: 0.1 Max: 10 Recommended: 4 margin - Bordering margin of the qrcode Min: 0 Max: 200 Recommended: 1 expiry - Image Expiry (In seconds) Min: 10 Max: 300 Recommended: 180 detail - The data you want the qrcode to hold. String Number URL Retriving the Code Images /images/[id] where id = the generated qrcode id
